name: IEEE-9th ICAIT 2017-International Conference on Advanced Infocomm Technology
content: IEEE-9th ICAIT 2017--Details:(http://icait.org/) 2017 IEEE 9th International Conference on Advanced Infocomm Technology (ICAIT 2017) will be held at Chengdu, China during November 22 to 24, 2017\. which is Sponsored by University of Electronic Science and Technology of China and IEEE, Co-sponsored by Auckland University of Technology, Auckland, New Zealand. Conference secretary: Frannie F. Li +86-28-8652-8629/ icait2017@zhconf.ac.cn \*\*\*Publication and Indexing: Accepted and Registered full papers will be published by IEEE conference publication , which will be indexed by IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex, and SCOPUS. \*\*\*Publication and Previous ICAIT Conferences: During 2011 to 2015, the conference was held in Shenzhen, Xi'an, Hainan, Wuhan, Paris, Hsinchu, Fuzhou and Hangzhou, and successfully published in ACM, IEEE, Springer and IOP proceeding. <\> <\> For more history, please see here: http://icait.org/ \*\*\*Committees: Chairman: IEEE Fellow, Shum Ping, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore; Co-chairmen: Peter Chong, Auckland University of Technology, New Zealand; Technical Program Chair: Shupeng Leng, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, China; Technical Program Co-chair: Jiajia Chen, KTH, Sweden.
